abstract: Mohammad Abdullah Saleem, Chicago-area imam and founder of the Institute of Islamic Education, is charged with sexual abuses of young women within his religious sect dating back to 1980s.
lead_paragraph: The announcement came hours before four women filed a lawsuit accusing Mohammad Abdullah Saleem of abuse dating back to the 1980s.

headline.main: Illinois: Imam Charged With Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Imam Charged With Sex Abuse

snippet: The announcement came hours before four women filed a lawsuit accusing Mohammad Abdullah Saleem of abuse dating back to the 1980s.
